items.content_html: Rivulex NestJS is a wrapper over Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It offers easy plug-in abstractions for NestJS, including a custom transport layer for event-driven communication, publisher, and event trimming, ensuring reliable, at-least-once message delivery.
items.title: raw-leak/nestjs-rivulex: Rivulex NestJS is a wrapper over Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It offers easy plug-in abstractions for NestJS, including a custom transport layer for event-driven communication, publisher, and event trimming, ensuring reliable, at-least-once message delivery.

items.content_html: Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.
items.title: raw-leak/rivulex: Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.

items.content_html: ngx-easy-state-manager is a lightweight, intuitive library for managing state in Angular applications. It simplifies state management by providing a straightforward API for creating, updating, and accessing state, without the complexity of traditional approaches.
items.title: PsySanchez/ngx-easy-state-manager: ngx-easy-state-manager is a lightweight, intuitive library for managing state in Angular applications. It simplifies state management by providing a straightforward API for creating, updating, and accessing state, without the complexity of traditional approaches.
